answers.author: Evelina Moulder
answers.text:
The results from ICMA's 2007 survey on service delivery show that Clay County, MO, contracted at that time with a private firm for cemetery management. I don't know if that is still the case, but I'm sure county staff could provide valuable information about their experience.
Best regards,

author: [Anonymous]
text:
I'm looking for insights from CM/CAs who have contracted with private cemetery management companies to operate municipal cemeteries.
Best practices? Prospective bidders? How to make the transition from City staff to private contractor?
title: Missouri Municipal Cemeteries
